Uses of Interface
org.apache.bookkeeper.zookeeper.RetryPolicy

  • Packages that use RetryPolicy 
    Package Description
    org.apache.bookkeeper.meta.zk
    ZooKeeper based metadata implementation.
    org.apache.bookkeeper.zookeeper
    A simple retryable zookeeper wrapper provided in bookkeeper.

    • Uses of RetryPolicy in org.apache.bookkeeper.zookeeper

      Classes in org.apache.bookkeeper.zookeeper that implement RetryPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BoundExponentialBackoffRetryPolicy
      Retry policy that retries a set number of times with an increasing (up to a maximum bound) backoff time between retries.
      class  ExponentialBackoffRetryPolicy
      A retry policy implementation that backoff retries exponentially.
      class  ExponentialBackOffWithDeadlinePolicy
      Backoff time determined based as a multiple of baseBackoffTime.
